scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “Come,” cried the inspector, laughing; “it’s a very pretty diversity of opinion. We have boxed the compass among us.
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: Who do you give your casting vote to?”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “You are all wrong.”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “But we can’t all be.”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “Oh, yes, you can. This is my point.” He placed his finger in the centre of the circle.
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “This is where we shall find them.”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “But the twelve-mile drive?” gasped Hatherley.
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “Six out and six back. Nothing simpler.
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: You say yourself that the horse was fresh and glossy when you got in. How could it be that if it had gone twelve miles over heavy roads?”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “Indeed, it is a likely ruse enough,” observed Bradstreet thoughtfully.
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “Of course there can be no doubt as to the nature of this gang.”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “None at all,” said Holmes. “They are coiners on a large scale, and have used the machine to form the amalgam which has taken the place of silver.”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “We have known for some time that a clever gang was at work,” said the inspector. “They have been turning out half-crowns by the thousand.
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: We even traced them as far as Reading, but could get no farther, for they had covered their traces in a way that showed that they were very old hands.
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: But now, thanks to this lucky chance, I think that we have got them right enough.”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: But the inspector was mistaken, for those criminals were not destined to fall into the hands of justice.
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: As we rolled into Eyford Station we saw a gigantic column of smoke which streamed up from behind a small clump of trees in the neighbourhood and hung like an immense ostrich feather over the landscape.
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: “A house on fire?” asked Bradstreet as the train steamed off again on its way.
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: “Yes, sir!” said the station-master.
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: “When did it break out?”
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: “I hear that it was during the night, sir, but it has got worse, and the whole place is in a blaze.”
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: “Whose house is it?”
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: “Dr. Becher’s.”
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: “Tell me,” broke in the engineer, “is Dr. Becher a German, very thin, with a long, sharp nose?”
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: The station-master laughed heartily. “No, sir, Dr. Becher is an Englishman, and there isn’t a man in the parish who has a better-lined waistcoat.
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: But he has a gentleman staying with him, a patient, as I understand, who is a foreigner, and he looks as if a little good Berkshire beef would do him no harm.”
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: The station-master had not finished his speech before we were all hastening in the direction of the fire.
scene_description: View from train, Eyford station platform, distant gigantic smoke column, trees, daytime.

segment_text: The road topped a low hill, and there was a great widespread whitewashed building in front of us, spouting fire at every chink and window, while in the garden in front three fire-engines were vainly striving to keep the flames under.
scene_description: Outdoors, country road over low hill, distant whitewashed building spouting smoke, daytime.

segment_text: “That’s it!” cried Hatherley, in intense excitement. “There is the gravel-drive, and there are the rose-bushes where I lay.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: That second window is the one that I jumped from.”
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: “Well, at least,” said Holmes, “you have had your revenge upon them.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: There can be no question that it was your oil-lamp which, when it was crushed in the press, set fire to the wooden walls, though no doubt they were too excited in the chase after you to observe it at the time.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: Now keep your eyes open in this crowd for your friends of last night, though I very much fear that they are a good hundred miles off by now.”
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: And Holmes’ fears came to be realised, for from that day to this no word has ever been heard either of the beautiful woman, the sinister German, or the morose Englishman.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: Early that morning a peasant had met a cart containing several people and some very bulky boxes driving rapidly in the direction of Reading, but there all traces of the fugitives disappeared, and even Holmes’ ingenuity failed ever to discover the least clue as to their whereabouts.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: The firemen had been much perturbed at the strange arrangements which they had found within, and still more so by discovering a newly severed human thumb upon a window-sill of the second floor.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: About sunset, however, their efforts were at last successful, and they subdued the flames, but not before the roof had fallen in, and the whole place been reduced to such absolute ruin that, save some twisted cylinders and iron piping, not a trace remained of the machinery which had cost our unfortunate acquaintance so dearly.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: Large masses of nickel and of tin were discovered stored in an out-house, but no coins were to be found, which may have explained the presence of those bulky boxes which have been already referred to.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: How our hydraulic engineer had been conveyed from the garden to the spot where he recovered his senses might have remained forever a mystery were it not for the soft mould, which told us a very plain tale.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: He had evidently been carried down by two persons, one of whom had remarkably small feet and the other unusually large ones.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: On the whole, it was most probable that the silent Englishman, being less bold or less murderous than his companion, had assisted the woman to bear the unconscious man out of the way of danger.
scene_description: Outdoors, large whitewashed building engulfed in flames, garden with rose bushes, three fire-engines.

segment_text: “Well,” said our engineer ruefully as we took our seats to return once more to London, “it has been a pretty business for me!
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: I have lost my thumb and I have lost a fifty-guinea fee, and what have I gained?”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.

segment_text: “Experience,” said Holmes, laughing. “Indirectly it may be of value, you know; you have only to put it into words to gain the reputation of being excellent company for the remainder of your existence.”
scene_description: Train interior, window view of passing countryside, upholstered seats, daytime.
